title: Drawing, "Two Apostles", ca. 1750
medium: Red chalk on cream laid paper
inscribed: verso in graphite, lower right corner: [symbol for check mark]; in graphite, lower center: [illeg.] says L. Giordano; in graphite, lower right corner: 1938-88-6549
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Peter, holding key, conversing with another Apostle.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Two Apostles", ca. 1750.
ca. 1750. Red chalk on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-6549.
